data.goal: Produce The Fashanus Episode 1 - first real production test of creative workflow
plan: Define episode story and character perspective
Create visual storyboard frames in Pencil
Write voiceover script for selected character

constraints: Must feel authentic to character voice

actions.summary: Defined Episode 1: "Breakfast Silence" - Rachel's POV. Her acts of service go unnoticed as family rushes through morning.
Created 6-panel storyboard in Pencil with AI-generated images for scenes: Dawn Kitchen, Hands Detail, Family Arrives, The Disconnect, The Exit, The Silence

data.result_summary: Produced Episode 1 "Breakfast Silence" storyboard: 6-panel visual narrative from Rachel's POV with AI-generated images, scene descriptions, and voiceover script (~75 seconds runtime).
